price: 56 Mais ils n’en tireront des leçons que si Allah le veut. Lui seul mérite leur crainte et peut leur accorder le pardon.
arabic: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā yadhkurūna illā an yashāa al-lahu huwa ahlu al-taqwā wa-ahlu al-maghfirati
